name: BucketField

constructors.name: BucketField
constructors.signature: public BucketField(Reports.BucketType bucketType, String devloperName, String label, Boolean nullTreatedAsZero, String otherBucketLabel, String sourceColumnName, List<Reports.BucketFieldValue> values)
constructors.description: Creates an instance of the Reports.BucketField class using the specified parameters.

params.name: values
params.description: The type of bucket. API name of the bucket. User-facing name of the bucket. Specifies whether null values are converted to zero (true) or not (false). Name of the fields grouped as Other (in buckets of BucketType PICKLIST). Name of the bucketed field. Types of the values included in the bucket.

constructors.name: BucketField
constructors.description: Creates an instance of the Reports.BucketField class. You can then set values by using the class’s set methods.

methods.name: getLabel
methods.description: Returns the user-facing name of the bucket.

methods.name: getNullTreatedAsZero
methods.description: Returns true if null values are converted to the number zero, otherwise returns false.

methods.name: getOtherBucketLabel
methods.description: Returns the name of fields grouped as Other in buckets of type PICKLIST.

methods.name: getSourceColumnName
methods.description: Returns the API name of the bucketed field.

methods.name: getValues
methods.description: Returns the report values grouped by the bucket field.

methods.name: setBucketType
methods.description: Sets the BucketType of the bucket.

params.name: value
params.description: See the Reports.BucketType enum for valid values.

methods.name: setBucketType
methods.description: Sets the BucketType of the bucket.

methods.name: setDevloperName
methods.description: Sets the API name of the bucket.

params.name: devloperName
params.description: The API name to assign to the bucket.

methods.name: setLabel
methods.description: Sets the user-facing name of the bucket.

methods.name: setNullTreatedAsZero
methods.description: Specifies whether null values in the bucket are converted to zero (true) or not (false).

methods.name: setOtherBucketLabel
methods.description: Sets the name of the fields grouped as Other (in buckets of BucketType PICKLIST).

methods.name: setSourceColumnName
methods.description: Specifies the name of the bucketed field.

methods.name: setValues
methods.description: Specifies which type of values are included in the bucket.

description: Contains methods and constructors to work with information about a bucket field, including bucket type, name, and bucketed values.
